body_html:
Was able to build tf v1.8 397f04a as mentioned in https://developer.ibm.com/tutorials/install-tensorflow-on-power/ had to downgrade bazel to 0.11.1.
Edit: cp cuda to local directory in case you don't have sudo access in order to create the symlink mentioned in the error section at the bottom in the documentation page.
body_text:
Was able to build tf v1.8 397f04a as mentioned in https://developer.ibm.com/tutorials/install-tensorflow-on-power/ had to downgrade bazel to 0.11.1.
Edit: cp cuda to local directory in case you don't have sudo access in order to create the symlink mentioned in the error section at the bottom in the documentation page.
body:
Was able to build tf v1.8 397f04acb1faeff451691d7fdc0f754eeb547cc1 as mentioned in https://developer.ibm.com/tutorials/install-tensorflow-on-power/ had to downgrade bazel to 0.11.1.
Edit: cp cuda to local directory in case you don't have sudo access in order to create the symlink mentioned in the error section at the bottom in the documentation page.
